casebody.data:
Christopher FITZPATRICK
v.
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, Trustee, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2017

Ryan P. Driscoll, in support of the petition.

Pierre-Yves Kolakowski, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 686, 164 A.3d 832 (2017), is denied.
